title: High Court Likely to Rule for Black Texas Inmate (Audio)
itunes:title: High Court Likely to Rule for Black Texas Inmate (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Greg Stohr, Supreme Court reporter for Bloomberg News and co-host of Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law," discusses a wide array of opinions that were handed down by the Supreme Court on Wednesday. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
